Name: Christ Church
Description: A southern parish known for its beaches, nightlife, and the international airport.

Name: Saint Andrew
Description: A rural parish known for its rugged terrain and scenic views of the east coast.

Name: Saint George
Description: An inland parish with agricultural land and historic sites.

Name: Saint James
Description: A western parish known for luxury resorts, historical sites, and beaches.

Name: Saint John
Description: A scenic eastern parish with dramatic cliffs and historic plantations.

Name: Saint Joseph
Description: A small parish known for the Bathsheba surfing area and lush gardens.

Name: Saint Lucy
Description: The northernmost parish, known for its caves, rugged coastline, and fishing villages.

Name: Saint Michael
Description: The most populated parish, home to the capital, Bridgetown, and key economic centers.

Name: Saint Peter
Description: A historic parish with luxury resorts and an important trading history.

Name: Saint Philip
Description: The largest parish by area, known for its rural setting and beautiful beaches.

Name: Saint Thomas
Description: A central parish with rolling hills and the famous Harrison s Cave attraction.
